books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing the world of magic, Hogwarts, and the battle against dark forces.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.description: The second year at Hogwarts, where Harry discovers the secrets of the Chamber of Secrets and confronts dark forces once again.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
books.description: Harry's third year at Hogwarts brings new challenges, including the escape of Sirius Black from Azkaban.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
books.description: The fourth installment in the series where Harry competes in the Triwizard Tournament and confronts Lord Voldemort.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
books.description: Harry's fifth year at Hogwarts, where he discovers the Order of the Phoenix and prepares for the dark times ahead.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
books.description: As the war against Voldemort intensifies, Harry learns about the past of the Half-Blood Prince.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
books.description: The final battle against Voldemort, where Harry and his friends fight to save the wizarding world.

books.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
books.description: A companion book to the Harry Potter series, detailing magical creatures and their habitats.
